title: The Short game in golf
brief_description: Golfer Tommy Armour demonstrates different styles, grips, and techniques in putting, and displays his techniques for making short, accurate shots when approaching the green. Shows how to extricate the ball from a sand trap. Slow motion photography is used in showing the stance and the swing.
